first_para: Gordon Raymond Banks (born 14 June 1955) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Ochil and South Perthshire since 2005.

full.extract: Gordon Raymond Banks (born 14 June 1955) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Ochil and South Perthshire since 2005.
full.title: Gordon Banks (politician)
